mapper.update: update project set status=1 where CURRENT_TIMESTAMP>projectBegin and projectEnd>CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
update project set status=0 where CURRENT_TIMESTAMP >projectEnd
update project set pageview=pageview+#{increment} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id,p.`name`, p.organizer,p.source,p.`type`,p.area,p.registerBegin,p.registerEnd,p.releaseTime, p.projectBegin,p.projectEnd,p.pageview, p.status,p.releaseUser,p.description,p.undertaker,p.university,p.personNum,p.cover, p.contact from project p join unit u on p.undertaker=u.id,university un,user where p.university=un.id and p.releaseUser=user.id and (p.id like concat('%',#{content},'%') or p.name like concat('%',#{content},'%') or p.organizer like concat('%',#{content},'%') or p.source like concat('%',#{content},'%') or p.area like concat('%',#{content},'%') or p.pageview like concat('%',#{content},'%') or user.username like concat('%',#{content},'%') or p.description like concat('%',#{content},'%') or u.name like concat('%',#{content},'%') or un.name like concat('%',#{content},'%') or p.personNum like concat('%',#{content},'%') or p.contact like concat('%',#{content},'%') ) ;
